amendments.title: To help ensure impartial justice by requiring the Chief Justice of the United States to rule on motions to subpoena witnesses and documents.
amendments.latest_major_action: Motion to table amendment SA 1294 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 25.

amendments.title: To allow additional time to file responses to motions.
amendments.latest_major_action: Motion to table amendment SA 1293 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 48. Record Vote Number: 24.

amendments.title: To provide that motions to subpoena witnesses or documents shall be in order after the question period.
amendments.latest_major_action: Motion to table amendment SA 1292 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 23.

amendments.title: To subpoena John Robert Bolton.
amendments.latest_major_action: Motion to table amendment SA 1291 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 22.
